snippet.title: Piece by Piece - Official Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Piece by Piece is a literal puzzle platformer where the level is your puzzle. Assemble and unassemble the pieces to get to the end of each level!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3249380/?utm_source=social&utm_medium=yt

A demo of Piece by Piece will be available during Steam's NextFest on February 24 - March 3. Wishlist Piece by Piece to help support our development!
